# selectedIndex

**Instance Property**

The index value for the most recently selected subitem of a grouped toolbar item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedIndex: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

When using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarItemGroup/SelectionMode-swift.enum/selectAny] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarItemGroup/SelectionMode-swift.enum/momentary] selection mode, don’t assume that this value represents the selected subitem. This method returns the index of the most recently selected subitem.

To determine if a specific subitem of a grouped toolbar item is selected, use the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarItemGroup/isSelected(at:)] method.

## Working with subitems

- **subitems**: The subitems of the grouped toolbar item.
- **isSelected(at:)**: Indicates whether a specified index is currently selected.
- **setSelected(_:at:)**: Sets the selected state of a subitem in a grouped toolbar item.
